title: Oberoi Group to open 50 new hotels by 2030
description: Oberoi also said that hotel rates need to increase in India. “I sometimes feel our rates in India should be much higher. I urge all our colleagues to drive rates up. Because we have amazing hotels. Whether it’s Taj, Leela, or Oberoi. Our hotels are world class in India,” he said.
